docs.snippet: A student's film said to have offended President Tito "in an especially rude manner," has touched off an uproar in Yugoslavia's movie world....
docs.lead_paragraph: A student's film said to have offended President Tito "in an especially rude manner," has touched off an uproar in Yugoslavia's movie world.
docs.abstract: Academy of Theater, Films Radio and TV, Communist orgn in Yugoslavia, has demanded that A Petrovic, leading film dir and teacher, be removed from assoc position for having given student, L Stojanovic, high grade for his film The Plastic Jesus, which is said to have offended Pres Tito; Petrovic, in lr printed on Jan 22 in Politika Ekspres (Belgrade newspaper), explains that he had graded film on basis of excerpts before they were put into final form; condemns film as 'political pornography' and says he dissociates himself from film's pol insinuations; teachers P Delibasic and Dr M Babac are expelled from Communist party for 'lack of pol vigilance'; V Slijepcevic, documentary film dir and academy lecturer, is under party investigation to determine his 'participation and responsibility' in affair; Communists at academy call for party rev of all films made there to weed out 'unacceptable'

headline.main: Yugoslav Student's Film Stirs Demands Teacher Be Punished; Graded on Excerpts Never Shown to Public

docs.snippet: A former assistant United States attorney who now has a substantial estate practice here was indicted by. a Manhattan grand jury yesterday on a charge of having stolen virtually all of the: inheritance of one of his clients, a total of $219,560....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former assistant United States attorney who now has a substantial estate practice here was indicted by. a Manhattan grand jury yesterday on a charge of having stolen virtually all of the: inheritance of one of his clients, a total of $219,560.
docs.abstract: Former Asst US Atty G J Leone is indicted by Manhattan grand jury on Jan 25 on charge of having stolen virtually all of M Ruggiero's inheritance of $219,560; Ruggiero recd inheritance from her father in '70 when she obtained Leone to handle funds; Asst Dist Atty O Cohen says Leone forged Ruggiero's signature and withdrew money for his own personal use

headline.main: Lawyer Charged With Stealing Client's Inheritiance of $219,560

docs.snippet: It was unbelievable. In little more than 41/2 minutes, George. Foreman destroyed Joe Frazier tonight, and the man who supposedly couldn't lose never had even one ghost of a chance for victory. So there is a new heavyweight champion of the world an...
docs.lead_paragraph: It was unbelievable. In little more than 41/2 minutes, George. Foreman destroyed Joe Frazier tonight, and the man who supposedly couldn't lose never had even one ghost of a chance for victory. So there is a new heavyweight champion of the world and he won it with authority in an demonstration of overpowering punching skills.

headline.main: An Abrupt End to the Frazier Reign; Arthur Daley Ali's Plea Goes-Down Drain The Punch That Never Was

docs.snippet: MANILA-"The Asian'De velopment Bank has to take care of all Asian countries, and for this our greatest need is additional resources," said Shiro Inoue ot Japan in describing his main concern as new president of the bank. He was interviewed at the ...
docs.lead_paragraph: MANILA-"The Asian'De velopment Bank has to take care of all Asian countries, and for this our greatest need is additional resources," said Shiro Inoue ot Japan in describing his main concern as new president of the bank. He was interviewed at the bank's new headquarters building overlooking Manila Bay during a recess from a series of signing ceremonies.
docs.abstract: Asian Development Bank pres S Inoue discusses bank's role in spurring econ development of Asian nations, int, Manila; sees additional resources as major need; describes projects financed by bank; por (Economic Survey of Asia and the Pacific)
